alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:06PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marengo and south central Sumter Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 206 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinterbish to near Jefferson to near Arcola. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Demopolis, Linden, Uniontown, Jefferson, Thomaston, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Freddie Jones Field, Pin Hook, Consul, Kinterbish, Chickasaw State Park, Half Acre, Old Spring Hill, Calvary and Whitfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
